entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
